website_summaries.verdict: A hiking shoe that you can use in and around water, the Merrell Hydrotrekker gets great feedback for being downright comfortable. It has gotten the approval of hikers and outdoor lovers who want a lightweight trail-capable shoe that they can use on diverse terrain, from forest trails to beaches, and rivers. A big bonus is its stylish look, which appeals to outdoor goers and casual wearers alike.It's a great water hiking shoe overall, though it's much more suited for milder terrain.
pros: The majority of the Merrell Hydrotrekker reviews speak of its incredible comfort level
Many hikers give it high ratings for its lightweight construction
It's a nice shoe for short hikes on relatively even terrain, according to some
Several reviewers say that they love how this shoe looks
The Merrell Hydrotrekker sandals deliver fine grip on mud, dirt, sand, and forest trails
A handful of customers are satisfied by its ability to dry quickly
cons: A significant number of users have had issues with the sole falling apart after some time of use

customer_reviews.title: Tread ripped apart after just one month!
customer_reviews.text: This was the most comfortable pair of sneakers I have ever owned. They’re the lightest and most comfortable sneakers. One month after purchase, while walking down the street, I thought something was stuck to the bottom of my shoe. Lifting my foot up I noticed that a big chunk of tread had been ripped off. This was very disappointing. It makes walking difficult if not impossible with the tread missing. It looks as if the adhesive holding the tread to the bottom sole is ineffective and flimsy. I did nothing other than a mild walk on flat level ground. This should not have happened. Hopefully the next one I purchase will have this issue fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry O.

customer_reviews.title: The soles were worn and coming off. I sent them back so dont have pictures
customer_reviews.text: Ive had merells before and I love them but this shoe was not made well. I have a tough hike coming up and I bought these to train for it and I took it on ONE 10 mile hike and the bottoms were worn down completely and one sole was coming off. The lettering inside the shoe was completely erased but that's just aesthetic, the worrisome part was the soles coming off after one hike. I had my shoes for one week and they looked like I had them for 6 years. This shoe did not perform and I would never purchase these again. I returned them and bought different Merrells
customer_reviews.author: Christian Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.  Horrible sole.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe's tread fell apart (photo attached) after 1 weekend of camping when I used them only while kayaking 3x's and doing a 2 mile round trip hike on a trail (had some smooth river rocks, but nothing jagged). I used other hiking shoes around the site while these shoes dried. The fit and feel of these shoes were great, but I was really shocked at how fast and how completely they fell apart because I have had Merrells before and really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Owned less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for less than a week and the rubber on the bottom of the shoe is already peeling back. I bought these for a trip to China next week and now will have to put up with that. The shoes would be great other than they’re already falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Nico Gowdy

customer_reviews.title: Merrell Hydrotrekker shoe defect
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of Merrell Hydrotrekker shoes for a trip to Croatia. Early in the trip a portion of the tread de-laminated and was torn off. From other comments, this appears to be a problem with this shoe. Would not recommend this purchase; see attached photo.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Amspoker

customer_reviews.title: Right sole tread came unglued after one day
customer_reviews.text: Returning the shoes. They felt comfortable but after a couple of stumbles I pulled the right shoe off and noticed the tread on the sole was coming unglued. Have not decided whether to try them again or not.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Wear Quality
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is comfortable, but within a week (I have 3 pairs I rotate) the tread on the soles began falling off. Now, large chunks of the outsole are falling. I’ve never experienced this with any other Merrell shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl L Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Water Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes, mainly for when I go kayak fishing. They work great, drain & dry quickly, and equally as important, provide good shade to prevent me getting sunburnt feet !!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne F.

customer_reviews.title: great water shoes !!
customer_reviews.text: great fit, great traction and the soles don’t hold dirt mud or rocks... perfect on the boat !!
customer_reviews.author: arrr-zeeee

customer_reviews.title: Wish the sole’s would last longer...disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Works well in rivers but the rubber soles deteriorated after my 3rd hike. I wont recommend if you hike in Hawaii...
customer_reviews.author: AManoa

customer_reviews.title: Only held up for a few days.
customer_reviews.text: The sole separated from the shoe after wearing them for 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Really Love These
customer_reviews.text: Light, comfortable and did a great job in the rainforest trails!
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Great River shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and they are great fo our river days!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoe
customer_reviews.text: These worked great on our tubing trip. I did not even feel like I was wearing a shoe at all while keeping my feet safe. These are a must have for any water activity.
customer_reviews.author: Joe F.

customer_reviews.title: Soles wear out after two months
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but the sole is made of a flimsy rubber material that has already come apart at the heel. 🤬
customer_reviews.author: William Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. True to size and width. Very comfortable, with good arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: Vary comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable better then what i thought and great price
customer_reviews.author: Victor fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe. I have used it for the past two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: barrion hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and function
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as a replacement for some $12 "water shoes" from REI from many summers ago. He is in a therapy pool once a week for Physical Therapy. His sensitive feet need protection from the treadmill that's in the pool and these are a serious upgrade. They are true to size (he wears an 11 EE in New Balance shoes and an 11 in everything else) and fit right out of the box. They drain very well and offer a ton of support. He wears them without socks in the pool. I will update this review if we have any wear issues as other reviewers have had. Cheers to Merrell for yet another amazing shoe!
customer_reviews.author: R. E. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing and terrible
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to take on a hiking, biking and kayaking trip. Of course these are a compromise and they look and felt great but as almost everyone else has reported, these things lost at least 50% of their 'nubs' on the sole in 1 afternoon of gentle walking in nature (lets not call it hiking) and when needed to walk out into the ocean w/ some slippery rocks above and below surface. Completely disappointing and I wish I had done more research. Find something else.
customer_reviews.author: IntermittentGenius

customer_reviews.title: Great quick drying shoe that is well designed
customer_reviews.text: Great design. This is s super lightweight shoe with sole that has superb traction and tight mesh uppers that drain and dry quickly. I wear a size 10 1/2 usually but the 9 1/2 is what fits me. These tend to run large. The laces allow you to cinch it tight. I looked at several for my trip to rainy season Panama but this was the clear favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in merrell. They used to stand for quality. Not now.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes, but the soles are garbage. I walk creeks to fish. Merrell has never steered me wrong. Until now. After only to times fishing (maybe 10 miles) the soles were coming off and almost half of the litte spikes were worn down all the way. I am very disappointed in merrell. I used to understand paying for quality and that's why I have used merrells alot. Now it seems they have gone the way of everyone else. Sell garbage at an expensive price just because they have name recognition.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Polis

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but...
customer_reviews.text: Fit great but I took them on a simple hike and after 3.2 miles the bottom tread was almost gone. They are so comfortable and I’m a huge Merrell fan but these need a major redesign on the tread and sole. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you clean the tread after use. It hangs on to debris
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe for light hiking, kayaking and just damm comfortable all around. Great stability in water. I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: LIAM B MACAGOWAN

customer_reviews.title: Worst product they make.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the shoe falls apart I had to return mine. Do not buy these. Merrell needs to recall these and refund anyone that bought them. Stay away. I will say all other Merrell shoes I’ve ever owned and do own are great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kincheloe

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Hydrotrekker Water Shoes
product_meta.description: Hike confidently in and around water in this trail-capable shoe built to dry out fast and protect your feet from debris and obstacles. Features: water friendly synthetic and mesh upper traditional lace closure hydramorph midsole channels and ports for water evacuation and air ventilation kinetic fit base removable contoured eva insole with water friendly top cover compression moulded eva midsole for stability and comfort M select wet outsole 3.5mm lug depth.
feature_bullets: Water friendly synthetic and mesh upper.
Traditional lace closure Hydramorph midsole channels and ports for water evacuation and air ventilation .
Kinetic Fit BASE removable contoured EVA insole with water friendly top cover.
Compression molded EVA midsole for stability and comfort M Select WET outsole.
